lyrics:
29 contributorssix degrees of separation lyricsverse 1
youve read the books
youve watched the shows
whats the best way no one knows yeah
meditate get hypnotized
anything to take from your mind
but it wont go

prechorus
youre doing all these things out of desperation
ohhh woah
youre going through six degrees of separation

verse 2
you hit the drink you take a toke
watch the past go up in smoke yeah
fake a smile yeah lie and say that
im better now than ever and your lifes okay
well its not no
youre doing all these things out of desperation
ohhh woah
youre going through six degrees of separation

chorus
first you think the worst is a broken heart
whats gonna kill you is the second part
and the third is when your world splits down the middle
and fourth youre gonna think that you fixed yourself
fifth you see them out with someone else
and the sixth is when you admit that you may have fucked up a little
see the script liveget tickets as low as 119you might also likeno no there aint no help its every man for himself
no no there aint no help its every man for himself

verse 3
you tell your friends yeah strangers too
anyonell throw an arm around you yeah
tarot cards
gems and stones
believing all that shit is gonna heal your soul
well its not no

prechorus
youre doing all these things out of desperation
ohhh woah
youre going through six degrees of separation

chorus
first you think the worst is a broken heart
whats gonna kill you is the second part
and the third is when your world splits down the middle
and fourth youre gonna think that you fixed yourself
fifth you see them out with someone else
and the sixth is when you admit that you may have fucked up a little

bridge
no theres no starting over
without finding closure
youd take them back
no hesitation
thats when you know youve reached the sixth degree of separation
bridge
no theres no starting over
without finding closure
youd take them back
no hesitation
thats when you know youve reached the sixth degree of separation

chorus
first you think the worst is a broken heart
whats gonna kill you is the second part
and the third is when your world splits down the middle
and fourth youre gonna think that you fixed yourself
fifth you see them out with someone else
and the sixth is when you admit that you may have fucked up a little

outro  fade
no no there aint no help its every man for himself
oh youre going through six degrees of separation
no no there aint no help its every man for himself
oh youre going through six degrees of separation
no no there aint no help its every man for himself
ooh
no no there aint no help its every man for himself
no no there aint no help its every man for himself
oh youre going through six degrees of separation
